papers.title: First Results on the Search for Lepton Number Violating Neutrinoless Double-$β$ Decay with the LEGEND-200 Experiment
papers.summary: Author(s): H. Acharya et al. (LEGEND Collaboration)The LEGEND Collaboration is searching for neutrinoless double-beta ($0νββ$) decay by operating high-purity germanium detectors enriched in $^{76}\mathrm{Ge}$ in a low-background liquid argon environment. Building on key technological innovations from the GERmanium Detector Array (GERDA) experiment a…[Phys. Rev. Lett. 136, 022701] Published Fri Jan 16, 2026

papers.title: Magnetic dipole moments adjacent to doubly magic nuclei in self-consistent mean-field theory with realistic spin-isospin and tensor forces
papers.summary: Author(s): H. Nakada and H. IwataMagnetic dipole ($M1$) moments in nuclei neighboring the doubly magic core are investigated by self-consistent mean-field (SCMF) approaches that allow for the breaking of time-reversal symmetry. By the SCMF calculations with the M3Y-P6 interaction, which keeps realistic spin-isospin and tensor chann…[Phys. Rev. C 113, 014315] Published Fri Jan 16, 2026
